mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, N.* from (select * from notice order by num asc) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice values(NVL((select max(num) from notice)+1,1), #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0, #{fname}, #{oname}))
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, reg_date=sysdate, fname=#{fname}, oname=#{oname} where num=#{num}
update notice set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
update notice set hit=hit-1 where num=#{num}
